titleStmt.title: Musarum deliciæ: or, The Muses recreation. Conteining severall select pieces of sportive vvit. / By Sr J.M. and Ja:S.
titleStmt.author: Mennes, John, Sir, 1599-1671.
Smith, James, 1605-1667.
Herringman, Henry, d. 1704,
H. H.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Anchor in the New Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Sr J.M. = Sir John Mennes; Ja: S. = James Smith.
Sixteen lines of text from the first p. 71 are repeated on the second page 71.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the Anchor in the New Exchange
